text:
If you define a marker only as a path (without style attributes) and bind it to
a polyline, for example as start-marker, the path element of the marker doesn't
inherit a stroke color from the polyline. For example you want to draw an line
with an arrow, the line has the correct color, but the corresponding arrow keeps
with black color. The possible reason is, that, in contrast to the UseElement,
that only a MarkerShapePainter is generated, but no subnodes with the deep copy
of the marker
creator: Christoph.Pollmann@web.de

text:
Marker's do not inherit style properties like the use element.
This may be fixed in future versions of the SVG Specification but
for now Batik is behaving correctly.
creator: deweese@apache.org
